title: National Flags & Black Flags at Panadura Protest against economic crisis
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); As protests against the mismanagement of Sri Lanka’s economy continue to grow, people in Panadura took to the streets with the National Flag and Black Flags to support the continuing protests.
The protestors were demanding solutions to the ongoing crises in Sri Lanka, and also demanded the government respond to the questions posed by the general public.
